Gravitation and Fitness in Ontology Dynamics
The Scales for Fitness
•
 
Ф
 
–
 
the degree of the conformance 
of an ontology to the requirements 
of the Domain Knowledge Stakeholders 
•
 
Difficult to measure 
•
 
Having the following is all not easy:
–
 
The requirements
–
 
The ontology
–
 
These two compared and difference / 
conformance measured

Done in our OntoElect OE methodology
